Entry.JapaneseText: 強くなったな……<Veigue>。 あのミルハウストを負かすとは……
Entry.EnglishText: You've grown strong, <Veigue>. Such that you were able to defeat Milhaust...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……いや…… あれはミルハウストの実力じゃない。
Entry.EnglishText: ...No. He wasn't at his full strength.

Entry.JapaneseText: 奴は心に重荷を抱えていた…… それがあいつの腕を鈍らせていた気がする。
Entry.EnglishText: He had a heavy burden on his heart... and I feel like it was weighing him down.

Entry.JapaneseText: あの戦いの中で、それだけ見極める事ができるなら、 充分、強くなった証拠だ。
Entry.EnglishText: You were able to grasp such a detail in the midst of battle. That alone is proof that you have grown.
